CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK(IF( saleswings__Contact__c <> null, "/" & saleswings__Contact__r.Id , if( saleswings__Lead__c <> null, "/" & saleswings__Lead__r.Id , "empty") ) ,IF( saleswings__Contact__c <> null,"Contact: " & saleswings__Contact__r.FirstName & " " & saleswings__Contact__r.LastName , if( saleswings__Lead__c <> null,"Lead: " & saleswings__Lead__r.FirstName & " " & saleswings__Lead__r.LastName , "empty") ),"_self" )
CustomField.label: Visitor Name
